author: Samuel Spade
subject: Re: LUPIN CAR!
body:
>The promotion must be fairly long then; lupin-3rd.net just posted the banner
>ad for it a few days ago (which is where I first saw it).

Some friends visiting from Saitama gave them too me a few months back. The car is a prize.

I'm still not clear on the car he drives, the one that isn't a fiat; is it a benz and if so what model?

David
